name: Cluck'd
description:
Made for the Very First Extra Credits Game Jam

Please give us a rating/leave a comment! https://itch.io/jam/extra-credits-game-design-jam/rate/295225

You are a cooking for a very impatient guest. Cooking bombs that is. If you don't feed the dragon enough exploding chickens before the time runs out, it'll decide to have you for lunch instead.

Coders:

rini_tintin  - DivideByZero  - Wander

Artist:

Student Qweakster, Giftaneer

Played best windowed mode, use keyboard for controls
